contentrichtext.text: This format fails to distinguish main articles, subtopics, and related topics. Those with a different level of hierarchy (ie, "main articles") need to be more prominent. --[[User:Jiang|Jiang]] 05:38, 22 Sep 2003 (UTC) :Well, the problem with that is that if we use "government" instead of "politics" and "society and infrastructure" instead of the various things we had before, then we won't have main articles for those topics. If you have a specific idea, could you please edit the page? -- [[User:Tim Starling|Tim Starling]] 05:46, Sep 22, 2003 (UTC) What if we still listed those articles (be careful to restrict them to "of Australia" ones) as ''main articles''? They need to be set apart somehow. --[[User:Jiang|Jiang]] 05:54, 22 Sep 2003 (UTC)
